## Introduction

If you are someone who works for long hours staring at your computer screen, then the brightness and contrast of your screen play a vital role in determining your overall visual experience. PangoBright is a free and simple software application that helps in adjusting the brightness and contrast of your computer screen.

## What is PangoBright?

PangoBright is a small software application that adds a system-tray icon to your Windows taskbar. This icon allows you to adjust the brightness and contrast of your screen with just a few clicks. This software is particularly helpful to those who work at night or in low-light environments.

## Features of PangoBright

Some of the key features of PangoBright include:

- Easy-to-use interface: PangoBright is a user-friendly software that is easy to operate.
- Customizable settings: The software allows you to customize your preferred brightness and contrast levels.
- Multiple monitors support: PangoBright supports multiple monitors, which means you can adjust the settings of all the screens connected to your computer.
- Keyboard shortcuts: PangoBright comes with a range of keyboard shortcuts that make it easy to adjust your monitor's brightness and contrast while you work.
- Automatic dimming: The software includes an automatic dimming feature that reduces the display's brightness and contrast gradually over time, thereby reducing eye strain.

## System Requirements

PangoBright is compatible with Windows 7, 8, and 10 operating systems. The software requires only a small amount of system resources and is designed to work with most computers.

## How to Download and Install PangoBright?

To download and install PangoBright on your computer, follow these simple steps:

1. Visit the [official website](https://www.pangobright.com/) of PangoBright.
2. Click on the "Download" button.
3. Choose to "Save" the file and then double-click on the downloaded file.
4. Follow the installation instructions to complete the installation process.
5. Once the installation is complete, the PangoBright icon will appear in your System Tray.

## Conclusion

PangoBright is a simple yet useful software that helps in adjusting the brightness and contrast of your computer screen. It is free to download and easy to use, making it an attractive option for those who suffer from eye strain or work in low-light environments. So, why not try PangoBright and improve your visual experience while working on your computer.
